mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TOKEN( TT_ID, TT_ACCESS_TOKEN, TT_EXPIRATION_DATE, TT_CUSTOMER_ID, CRE_DATE, UP_DATE ) VALUES ( nextval('TOKEN_SEQ'), #{token.accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token.expirationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{token.customer.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_TOKEN WHERE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > TT_EXPIRATION_DATE;
mapper.select: SELECT tok.TT_ID AS id, tok.TT_ACCESS_TOKEN AS accessToken, tok.TT_EXPIRATION_DATE AS expirationDate, tok.TT_CUSTOMER_ID AS customerId, tok.CRE_DATE AS createDate, tok.UP_DATE AS updateDate, CU.CU_ID AS idCustomer, CU.CU_NAME AS name, CU.CU_FIRST_NAME AS firstName FROM T_TOKEN tok JOIN T_CUSTOMER CU ON CU.CU_ID=tok.TT_CUSTOMER_ID WHERE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP <= TT_EXPIRATION_DATE AND CU.CU_ID=#{customerId};

SELECT tok.TT_ID AS id, tok.TT_ACCESS_TOKEN AS accessToken, tok.TT_EXPIRATION_DATE AS expirationDate, tok.TT_CUSTOMER_ID AS customerId, tok.CRE_DATE AS createDate, tok.UP_DATE AS updateDate, CU.CU_ID AS idCustomer, CU.CU_NAME AS name, CU.CU_FIRST_NAME AS firstName, RO.RO_ID AS roleId, RO.RO_CODE AS roleCode, RO.RO_NAME AS roleName, FU.FU_ID AS fuId, FU.FU_CODE AS fuCode, FU.FU_NAME AS fuName, FU.CRE_DATE AS fuCreateDate, FU.UP_DATE AS fuUpdateDate FROM T_TOKEN tok JOIN T_CUSTOMER CU ON CU.CU_ID=tok.TT_CUSTOMER_ID JOIN T_ROLE RO ON RO.RO_ID=CU.CU_ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN T_ROLE_FUNCTION RF ON RF.RO_ID=RO.RO_ID LEFT JOIN T_FUNCTION FU ON FU.FU_ID=RF.FU_ID WHERE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP <= TT_EXPIRATION_DATE AND tok.TT_ACCESS_TOKEN=#{accessToken};
